ISSUE.TITLE: Update EE Add/List/Edit/Details with latest API changes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Update EE Add/List/Edit/Details with latest API changes. There is a field name now, for instance. Evaluate the latest API changes, and update UI accordingly.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Bump up unified_jobs_table version for new column addition
